<dd class="note">
When working with multiline controls [[ctrlTextWidth]] or [[getTextWidth]] will not return a proper value since the text will be treated as one long line.</br>

'''Solution (Execute in [[Eden Editor]]):'''

<code> [[disableSerialization]];
  
 [[private]] _display <template><title>=</title></template> [[findDisplay]] 313 [[createDisplay]] "RscDisplayEmpty";
  
 [[private]] _edit <template><title>=</title></template> _display [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscEditMulti", -1];
 _edit [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,1,1];
 _edit [[ctrlSetBackgroundColor]] [0,0,0,1];
 _edit [[ctrlSetFont]] "EtelkaMonospacePro"; 
 _edit [[ctrlSetFontHeight]] 0.03;
 _edit [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
 
 [[private]] _longestLineWidth <template><title>=</title></template> 0;
 [[private]] _exampleString <template><title>=</title></template> "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvxyz0134567890";
 [[private]] _text <template><title>=</title></template> "";
 
 [[for]] "_lines" [[from]] 1 [[to]] 400 [[do]] <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Loop through all lines and find the longest one</value></part></template>
 {
    _lineText <template><title>=</title></template> _exampleString [[select]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[round]] [[random]] 35];
    _longestLineWidth <template><title>=</title></template> _longestLineWidth [[max]] (_lineText [[getTextWidth]] ["EtelkaMonospacePro", 0.03]);
    _text <template><title>=</title></template> _text [[+]] _lineText [[+]] [[endl]];
 };
 
 _edit [[ctrlSetPositionW]] (_longestLineWidth [[+]] 2 * 0.008); <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Width of longest line + left and right margin set in engine</value></part></template>
 _edit [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
 _edit [[ctrlSetText]] _text;</code>
</dd>
